Title: Provides for reimbursement for certain insurance premiums for certain members of the naval militia, New York air, army national guard, and New York guard
Summary: Provides for reimbursement for certain insurance premiums for certain members of the naval militia, New York air, army national guard, and New York guard.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to providing for reimbursement for certain insurance premiums for certain members of the naval militia, New York air, army national guard, and New York guard
